mean_cn: n. 过高的要价，超载，装药过多，过度充电；  v. 讨价过高，装药过多，夸张，过度充电
mean_en: to charge someone either more than the real price or more than the value of the product or service
sentence: The tourist was overcharged by the taxi driver when going to the airport.
sentence_trans: 这位旅客去机场时被出租车司机宰了（漫天要价了）。
word_etyma: over过度 + charge要价→overcharge过度要价
